p: Bitten month is the month where the victim experienced a snakebite. The National Snakebite Survey reported snakebite events that occurred during a period of 23 months and bitten months are denoted by ‘ t’ (i.e. t = 1, 2, … 23). Note that the 13th bitten month corresponds to the 1st survey month, as survey reported snakebite data for the preceding 12 months.
